abstract: Two British teenagers are charged with stealing artifacts from former Auschwitz-Birkenau death camps that were at state museum.
lead_paragraph: The unidentified Britons were accused of stealing artifacts, including a razor, buttons and pieces of glass and cutlery, which once belonged to prisoners at the camps.

headline.main: Poland: British Teenagers Are Charged With Stealing From Auschwitz Site
headline.print_headline: Europe; Poland: British Teenagers Are Charged With Stealing From Auschwitz Site

snippet: The unidentified Britons were accused of stealing artifacts, including a razor, buttons and pieces of glass and cutlery, which once belonged to prisoners at the camps.
